text.section:
Sec. 27-5. Violations, penalty.
Any person violating any of the provisions of this chapter shall be deemed guilty of a misdemeanor and upon conviction thereof shall be fined not exceeding one hundred dollars ($100.00) or may be punished by imprisonment not exceeding ten (10) days, or by both such fine and imprisonment. Each day such violation is committed, or permitted to continue, shall constitute a separate offense and shall be punishable as such hereunder.
